thread.title: MG Squared at Ohio Transportation & Engineering Conference 27-28 October
thread.title_full: MG Squared at Ohio Transportation & Engineering Conference 27-28 October

title: MG Squared at Ohio Transportation & Engineering Conference 27-28 October
text:
MG Squared will be displaying our innovative technology this year at the Ohio Transportation & Engineering Conference 27-28 October, booth number 108. 
Highlights include: Operate the MG² camera lowering device Learn how to improve the safety and efficiency of your CCTV Deployment via the utilisation of the camera lowering device Discover cutting-edge technologies, new products, and must-have services from 600+ exhibitors Tour the operations centre of the Emergency Communication Bureau. The staff will describe what happens during a disaster, beginning with a briefing to explain how a call for service runs its course, and how Control One is unique compared to other counties Attend free on-floor education sessions, including the solutions theater, poster sessions, and ASIS / (ISC)² career centre Follow Us:
